channel.title: Crafting interface
channel.description:
well moparscapers,
i have the problem that i want that when u use a ball of whool or something on a spinning wheel the crafting interface will open. i maded a code but that didn't work could someone help me with this?
spinning wheel id == 2644 crafting interface id == 2311
thanks, halflive9
